channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Abortions are up in the US. The data paints a complicated picture
item.description: Even with abortion bans in place in most Republican-controlled states, the number of people obtaining them has grown slightly.

item.title: Winning ticket for $1.22 billion lottery jackpot sold in California, Mega Millions says
Trump appears to side with Musk, tech allies in debate over foreign workers roiling his supporters
